short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create a watchlist of YouTube videos and watch Ad free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summary
Easily create and manage a watchlist of your favorite YouTube videos. Save videos directly from a URL and view them anytime.

Description
YouTube Watchlist is designed to help users gather and organize videos from across different YouTube channels and playlists into one place. This extension allows you to save videos directly from a URL, so you can return and watch them later, whenever it's convenient.

Our extension focuses on privacy and simplicity. Users do not need to create an account or provide any personal information to use YouTube Watchlist. Instead, a unique device ID is generated during the first use, allowing the extension to identify you across sessions without needing personal data.

Key features:

Easily collect and save YouTube videos from different channels
Organize videos into a custom watchlist for later viewing
No account creation required, preserving your privacy
Automatically generates a device ID to sync your watchlist across multiple sessions
Simple and intuitive interface for a smooth user experience
This extension requires minimal permissions to function, ensuring your data stays secure. YouTube Watchlist enhances your browsing experience by making it easier to save and organize videos without any additional hassle.

Install now to enjoy a smarter way to manage your YouTube video collection!
